Change the name of this store.
Change the category of this store.
Change the function of this store.
Change the latitude and longitude of this store. Enter 0 if unknown.
Change the treatment session interval (in days) for this store. The default setting should be 1.
Change the treatment session latency (in days) for this store.The defualt setting should be 1.

Change the fraction of storage available. This indicates the portion of a location available for treatment-related storage, and is applicable only if the location is shared. Enter 1 if the entire location is available for storage (most common).
Enter notes for this store - they are not included in HERMES calculations.
